definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

pinyin: lian4 shi4 lie4 bian4 fan3 ying4

sentences.english: The liquid solution is used for nuclear fuel in the solution reactor.
sentences.chinese: 溶液堆使用裂变物质的水溶液为核燃料。

sentences.english: Or maybe it’s an explosion like nuclear fission.
sentences.chinese: 或者它可以像核裂变一样爆发。

sentences.english: The amount of material produced during fission is insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 裂变时产生的物质数量是不够的。

sentences.english: And the energy is relatively large, 168 MEV per fission.
sentences.chinese: 能量是相当大的，168兆伏，每裂变。

sentences.english: Deformation motion of the fission process is considered as a diffusion motion.
sentences.chinese: 裂变核的变形运动被看作为扩散运动。

sentences.english: The reference fission yield file was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了评价标准裂变产额数据文档。

sentences.english: Fertile meaning the none fissionable uranium 235.
sentences.chinese: 丰富的意思是裂变的铀。

sentences.english: The fissions (or fusions) of these localized coherent structures may occur after their interactions.
sentences.chinese: 这些局域相干结构的相互作用存在裂变和聚变现象。

sentences.english: After the Great Patriotic War, the Soviet Union's nuclear fission research have no news.
sentences.chinese: 卫国战争爆发后，苏联核裂变研究陷入停滞。

sentences.english: The uranium fuel generates heat by neutron-induced nuclear fission.
sentences.chinese: 铀燃料是由中子导致的核裂变产生的能量加热的。

sentences.english: Nuclear fission releases tremendous amounts of energy.
sentences.chinese: 核裂变释放出巨大的能量。

sentences.english: One of the fission of aesthetic ideas is the dailizati on of aesthetic .
sentences.chinese: 审美观念的裂变之一，就是审美日常化。

sentences.english: Don't strive merely for quantity of production.
sentences.chinese: 裂变时产生的物质数量是不够的。

sentences.english: Geiger counters detect radiation emitted from decaying atoms.
sentences.chinese: 盖格计算器从原子裂变过程中探测到放射出的辐射量。

sentences.english: At these very high temperatures the nonfissioned parts of the nuclear weapon are vaporized.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的高温下，核弹的非裂变部分将被气化。

sentences.english: Can you clarify whether China is producing fissile material for weapons purposes?
sentences.chinese: 你能否澄清，中国是否还在生产核武器用裂变材料？

definition: to cause to burn/to ignite/to detonate/a fuse
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]
